feat.value: When the blessed Ephraim was a little boy he saw a dream or a revelation
that a grapevine sprouted in his tongue
and it grew and it filled all the land under the sky whose fruit (sic) were very good,
and they came, that is all the birds of the sky
and (every) one that will be eaten in the grapevine,
it always sprouts by it more, other fruit.
